snippet: The military searched Sunday for an armed South Korean soldier who fled after killing five of his comrades and wounding seven at an outpost near the North Korean border....

headline.print_headline: Search On for SKorea Soldier Who Killed 5 Comrades
headline.main: Search On for SKorea Soldier Who Killed 5 Comrades

lead_paragraph: The military searched Sunday for an armed South Korean soldier who fled after killing five of his comrades and wounding seven at an outpost near the North Korean border.
